thread.title: Michael Brown’s Father on Ferguson Riots: ‘They Asked for It’
thread.title_full: Michael Brown’s Father on Ferguson Riots: ‘They Asked for It’

author: Bob Price
title: Michael Brown’s Father on Ferguson Riots: ‘They Asked for It’
text: Marchers attempt to shut down a street after a rally at the Jefferson City State Capitol building in Jefferson City, Mo. Friday, December 5, 2014.during an NAACP rally in the Missouri Capitol, in Jefferson City, Mo., Friday morning, Dec. 5, 2014. Chants of "Hands Up. Don't Shoot!" echoed through the Missouri Capitol on Friday as hundreds of people protesting Michael Brown's death rallied after the culmination of a weeklong, 130-mile march from the site of the police shooting in Ferguson. (AP Photo/The Jefferson City News-Tribune, Justin L. Stewart)
